actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to require that the three U.S. Commissioners on the International Joint Commission of the United States and Canada be appointed by the President by and with the advice and consent of the Senate.

summary.text: Requires that the three United States Commissioners on the International Joint Commission of the United States and Canada be appointed by the President by and with the advice and consent of the Senate.

titles.title: A bill to require that the three U.S. Commissioners on the International Joint Commission of the United States and Canada be appointed by the President by and with the advice and consent of the Senate.
